definition: weak/feeble/young/inferior/(following a decimal or fraction) slightly less than

sentences.english: " Only strong personalities can endure history, the weak ones are extinguished by it. " — Friedrich Nietzsche.
sentences.chinese: 只有剛烈的個性方能承受歷史，懦弱的則消失其中。

sentences.english: I was obliged to confess, and in recompense for my cowardice and inhumanity was sent out of the house.
sentences.chinese: 作爲對我的懦弱和不友好的賞罰，我被趕出了房子。

sentences.english: Spiritless is the mouth which very difficult to close up.
sentences.chinese: 懦弱是一條很難合攏的口。

sentences.english: Cowardly Christianity never poses a threat to the powers and principalities of darkness.
sentences.chinese: 懦弱的基督徒從來不會對黑暗勢力及當權者構成威脅。

sentences.english: One lady says she hates a man who is too weak and too submissive.
sentences.chinese: 一位女士說她討厭那種很懦弱和逆來順受的男人。

sentences.english: Women find it wussy, and it annoys the heck out of them.
sentences.chinese: 女人覺得這是懦弱無能的表現，對這點她們厭惡無比。

sentences.english: A mousy librarian inherits her father's beloved but failing old movie house.
sentences.chinese: 懦弱的圖書館工作員繼承了她父親深愛的電影院。

sentences.english: Frightened bilgerats aboard a derelict ship?
sentences.chinese: 一艘破船上一羣懦弱的船員？

sentences.english: Becoming obsessed with efficiency can make us cowardly.
sentences.chinese: 沉迷於效率會讓我們變得懦弱。

sentences.english: Fear of corrupting the mind of the younger generation is the loftiest form of cowardice.
sentences.chinese: 害怕年青一代有貪污的念頭是懦弱最誇大的表現。

sentences.english: I hate to see his weak personality that makes him simply turn the other cheek.
sentences.chinese: 看不慣他這種唾面自乾的懦弱性格。

sentences.english: I often say to people that producing is the best paid form of cowardice.
sentences.chinese: 我常跟人說，“製作”是對懦弱的最佳回饋方式。

sentences.english: Being cowardly means being content within our own cowardliness.
sentences.chinese: 懦弱是指我們在自己的懦弱中感到舒適。

sentences.english: Being cowardly means being content within our own cowardliness.
sentences.chinese: 懦弱是指我們在自己的懦弱中感到舒適。

sentences.english: Cowardly Christianity never grabs hold of a generation and re-shapes history.
sentences.chinese: 懦弱的基督徒從來不拯救一代人，從來不會改變歷史。

sentences.english: Is lovely to cede territory indemnity in the Tan Yuan, feeble in character of make people don't humiliate him embarrassed.
sentences.chinese: 乖在檀淵割地賠款，懦弱的讓人不欺負他都不好意思。

definition: to bear patiently/to endure silently/to forbear
timid/to be afraid of getting involved/to be afraid of getting into trouble
